Paragraph: 11 Our preliminary investigation on the photovoltaic properties of PCDSeBT in typical BHJ devices with [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) shows a highly respectrable PCE of 4.12% on account of the high J SC and V OC .

| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 11 Our preliminary investigation on the photovoltaic properties of PCDSeBT in typical BHJ devices with [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) shows a highly respectrable PCE of 4.12% on account of the high J SC and V OC .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| photovoltaic properties of PCDSeBT |
| typical BHJ devices |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |
| PCE |
| high J SC |
| high V OC |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| photovoltaic properties of PCDSeBT |
| PCE |
| high J SC |
| high V OC |

Explanation:

* "Our preliminary investigation" and "shows" are not material properties.
* "on account of" is a preposition and does not refer to a material property.
* "highly respectrable" is an adjective modifying PCE and does not need to be included as it is a subjective description of the property value.
* "in typical BHJ devices" is a location description and does not refer to a material property.
* "[6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)" is a material name, but it is not a property name as it is not describing a specific property of the material.
